inclusion.criterion: Estimated glomerular filtration rate below 20 ml/min
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A clinical judgement made by the contact nurse and the contact physician
inclusion.label: met

notes: 35-year-old woman with myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She complains of diplopia and fatigue and weakness that affects mainly her upper limbs.
